Title: Coldhearted
Writer: Jon Weisman, Bob Kane (character created by: Batman), Geoff Johns (character created by: Miss Martian), Tony S. Daniel (character created by: Miss Martian), Gardner Fox (character created by: Zatanna), Gardner Fox (character created by: Doctor Fate)
Actors: Lacey Chabert, Jesse McCartney, Stephanie Lemelin, Danica McKellar
Plot: On his birthday, Kid Flash must deliver a transplant heart in a race against time, artificial extreme weather conditions and supervillain opposition.
